summary: A lite combat mod that modifies vanilla settings to make combat a little bit more satisfying.
descriptionHtml:
[b]This mod use a lot of Stagger and Knockdown effects. So If you don't like them in vanilla, you will definitely not enjoy this mod.

[/b]This is a WIP, I made it so I can enjoy skyrim a little bit better.

[u]Requirement---[/u]
﻿Skyrim + DLC (Non SE)

[u]Script used:[/u]
    VoicePushEffect on Magic Effects.

[u]MOVEMENTS---[/u]
    Reduce movement speed in combat and out of combat. default 370fwd to 280fwd 240side.
    Archer Drawn Movement/Mages casting movement speed reduce to 120fwd 76side.
    Reduced turn angle when in combat, swinging weapons, casting, etc.
    Jumpheight from 72 to 30.
    JumpMovemult(Movement in Air) from .05 to .03
    Remove restriction from jumping when attacking and casting. Basically you can jump to cancel attack.
    
[u]WEAPONS---[/u]
    All Attack should stagger at .15, cause the lowest staggered animation to played.

[u]Shield/Bash Attk[/u]
    buff.disarm.bows and incoming forward power attks
    
[u]Bows[/u]
    buff.Stagger on hit.Race ability
    buff.knockdown actor when sprinting.enchant
    buff.disarm All powerattks.enchant
    
    debuff.Power attks disarm bows and xbows
    debuff.shieldbash disarm bows and xbows
    
[u]mace[/u]
    buff.power attks cause heavy .75 stagger
    
[u]dagger[/u]
    buff.power attks cause heavy .75 stagger
    buff.onLeftHand.powerattk standing cause max stagger
    buff.onFlee insta kill

[u]axe[/u]
    buff.power attks cause heavy .75 stagger
    buff.Disarm.onLefthand, all power attks disarms
    [u]
dualAttak[/u]
    buff.stagger. 1.0 stagger when not blocking
    buff.disarm. power attack disarms all incoming attacks
[u]
swords[/u]
    buff.power attks cause heavy .75 stagger
    buff.onLeftHand.power attk standing cause max stagger
    buff.onFlee insta kill.
        
[u]hammer[/u]
    buff.knockdown.all power attack knockdown
    buff.basicAttks.max stagger, knocked down when stagger
    buff.noRecoil when attacking enemy that are blocking
    
[u]2haxe[/u]
    buff.knockdown.all power attack ko
    buff.basicAttks.max stagger, knocked down when staggered
[u]
2hsword[/u]
    buff.knockdown.all power attack ko
    buff.basicAttks.max stagger, knocked down when staggered
    
[u]unarm[/u]
    buff.basic attack staggers
    buff.powerAttks.knockdown when stagger
    buff.h2h combo knockdown when not blocking
    buff.sneakattk.uppercut
    
    
[u]SpellModification---[/u]

[u]Flames[/u]
    buff.stagger
    buff.remove. perk intense fear requirement
    debuff.added +.2 charge time
    
[u]Firebolt[/u]
    buff.stagger
    buff.knockdown when staggered
    
[u]Fireball[/u]
    buff.knockdown on hit
    
[u]Incinerate[/u]
    buff.stagger

[u]Frostbite[/u]
    buff.paralysis.Freeze target if stamina is 0, if FrostResist < 25%
    debuff.added +.2 charge time

[u]IceSpike[/u]
    buff.stagger
    buff.knockdown when staggered

[u]IceStorm[/u]
    buff.stagger
    buff.paralysis.Freeze target if stamina is 0, if FrostResist < 25%
    debuff.increase charge time to .8 from .5

[u]IcySpear[/u]
    buff.Knockdown onHit
    debuff.increase charge time .8 from .5    

[u]WallofFrost[/u]
    buff.paralysis.Freeze target if stamina is 0, if FrostResist < 25%

[u]Spark[/u]
    buff.stagger
    buff.knockdown when staggered
    debuff.added .2 charge time
    debuff.castduration. from 0 to .1 -Looks like an actual spark now-
[u]
LightningBolt[/u]
    buff.stagger
    buff.paralysis when staggered if lighningRes < 25%
    
[u]ChainLightning[/u]
    buff.paralysis for 1 sec if lighningRes < 25%

[u]Thunderbolt[/u]
    buff.knockdown onHit

[u]KillAnimations---[/u]
    
[u]SneakKillMoves[/u]
    Always trigger when undetected, only 1h sword/dagger and unarmed.
    
[u]BackKillMoves[/u]
    Only triggers when NPC target is in Fleeing condition and moving forward, doesn't work if staggered.
[u]
FrontKillMoves[/u]
    NPC only, everything else should be Lasthostile and ifAttackKills conditions.
    
    buff.1hSword/Dagger and 2hSword ability to instakill when npc is using forward power attk.
    buff.AllMeleeWeapons.Insta Kill when Enemy is recoil large (Timed Bash at right moment, when enemy arm is in air)
    buff.AllMeleeWeapons.Insta Kill mages, archers, and unarm targets, must be staggered first.

[u]CombatStyle---[/u]

    Mages and Archer should try to stay/move further away and prefer their weapon of choice.
    Melee/mages/archers switched from dueling style to flanking style, will now move and attack your blind spots.
    Melee more defensive when 1v1, more aggressive when multiple enemies.

[u]SideEffects of these modifications:[/u]

Increased difficulty, especially with mages since the mod effects both npc and player abilities.
The satisfaction of dieing by getting knocked out and clobbered over and over again on the ground.
Timed-Instakill is really satisfying.
Magic feels more powerful, more utility. Aoe Control
More responsive enemy AI.
Removed some of the spongy-ness from combat.
2H weapons feels more powerful, visually.
